title: How Can I Tell You? (CRS029)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! A story that Susan Kent first shared on the podcast in September of 2012, about hiding her teenage pregnancy from her mother.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Susan Kent, Ramona Falls, kevin Allison)
